name: Ranger
shortDescription: Skilled hunters who blend martial prowess with nature magic to track and defeat their foes.
description: Rangers are guardians of the wilds and expert trackers. They combine weapon mastery, survival skills, and primal magic to control terrain and strike decisively.

spellcasting.description: Rangers prepare spells from the ranger spell list, drawing on primal magic tied to the natural world.

features.name: Favored Foe
features.description: You can mark a creature you hit to deal extra damage to it and track it more easily.

features.name: Deft Explorer
features.description: You gain expertise and movement benefits reflecting your mastery of exploration.

features.name: Fighting Style
features.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You gain the ability to cast ranger spells using Wisdom.

features.name: Ranger Archetype
features.description: Choose a ranger archetype that defines your hunting methods.

features.name: Primeval Awareness
features.description: You can attune your senses to the surrounding wilderness to detect certain creature types.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Extra Attack
features.description: You can attack twice when you take the Attack action.

features.name: Favored Foe Improvement
